message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value.
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $180 is too low for me.  How about we settle at $190?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit shy of the price I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at $175?
